channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Flooding cancels last day of Wisconsin State Fair as severe storms knock out power and close roads
item.description: Flash flooding canceled the final day of the Wisconsin State Fair on Sunday as continued heavy rainfall in half a dozen Midwest states has led to water rescues, power outages and road closures.

item.title: Texas Legislature to take another swing at redistricting vote as Democrats extend their walkout
CDC shooter blamed COVID vaccine for depression; union demands statement against misinformation
